content.text:
# Honduran Revolutionary Party

Honduran Revolutionary Party (Partido Revolucionario Hondure√±o) was a small clandestine leftist party in Honduras, which was formed in 1961 by former members of the Communist Party of Honduras who sought a more "scientifically Marxist" platform. PRH was active in the peasants' movement. In 1993, the PRH merged with three other groups to form the Democratic Unification Party.
